metadata.dc:author: Roche, C
Gracia, R
Pascual Castroviejo, I
López Pajares, I
metadata.dc:description: A case of Dyschondrosteosis associated with Turner's syndrome is presented. There is no evidence of an autosomal dominant inheritance. The patient shows the typical clinical and radiological aspects of this disease, with severe intensity. Mental retardation is also important.
metadata.dc:title: Discondrosteosis: Asociación a síndrome de Turner en un caso
[Dyschondrosteosis associated with turner's syndrome (author's transl)].
